Job Description: 5+ years of experience in software development, business analysis or similar roles. Work from home and in US business hours time zone is a must. Key responsibilities: Developing a mobile PWA (Progressive Web App) to support cell site field activity Creatively coming up with solutions to automate cross-platform processes that typically require manual intervention Working closely with other developers in a team approach Supporting/working with non-software engineersKey qualities: Strong programming and design background Ability to work on both back-ends and UIs Interest in RF/Telecom, some RF background or mobile application development is a plus but not required Superb communication skillsSpecific software/Programming Literacy: Node.js, Angular, JavaScript/TypeScript NoSQL experience (e.g. MongoDB, CouchDB) a plus Docker Git Comfort with terminals
